snippet.title: Johnny Depp makes rare red carpet appearance amid Amber Heard drama
snippet.description:
Title: Johnny Depp Returns To Red Carpet, Soon Surrounded By Die-Hard Fans

Read More Stories Here: www.haveitalldaily.com 

Description: 
Johnny Depp is the centre of attention once again for all the right reasons as he attended a screening of his latest film at the 47th Deauville Film Festival in France of Sunday. After numerous bad press including the recent libel case, die hard fans proved they will always have Depp’s back as they gathered for a glimpse of Depp in northwestern France. 

Depp was promoting City of Lies which is based on an unsolved murder of '90s rap giants Tupac Shakur and the Notorious B.I.G, out of competition at this year's ceremony.

Depp looked happy to be back on the red carpet but also excited to spend time with fans as he stopped to talk to some giving out autographs ahead of the screening. 

This is a true turning point for Depp and may be exactly what he needs to put the recent bad publicity behind him though only time will tell.
